physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is arranged in reverse chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 6; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains two letters from F J McLintic, Chief Special Police Office at Ahmadi, addressed to the Kuwait Political Agent. The letters concern the cancellation of Dudley Preston Lester's appointment as a Special Police Officer, and the appointment of Daniel Dudley Williams. The file contains brief biographical and employment details for Mr Williams.
